name: APActivationPayload
desc: Information that’s passed to an App Clip on launch.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL of the link that launched the App Clip.

items.name: func confirmAcquired(in: CLRegion, completionHandler: (Bool, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Checks whether an App Clip invocation happened at an expected physical location.

items.name: let APActivationPayloadErrorDomain: String
items.desc: A string that identifies the activation payload’s error domain.

items.name: struct APActivationPayloadError
items.desc: An error that an App Clip activation payload returns.
